saved_recipes.title: Recipe Name: Taco Spaghetti Burger Bowl
ingredients: - Burger buns (optional, if you prefer to have your meal as a burger)
saved_recipes.instructions:
1. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned. Drain any excess grease.

2. Stir in the taco seasoning and water. Let it simmer for a few minutes until the sauce has thickened.

3. While the beef is cooking, bring a large pot of water to a boil and cook the spaghetti noodles according to the package instructions. Drain the noodles and keep them warm.

4. Heat the spaghetti sauce in a small saucepan over medium heat until it is hot.

5. To assemble the bowls, start with a base of spaghetti noodles. Top with the taco-seasoned ground beef.

6. Pour over some of the heated spaghetti sauce.

7. Add a handful of shredded lettuce and sprinkle with diced tomatoes, onions, and olives.
